page.title: 05 A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ME
page.content: ** SATURDAY ** I wake up at about 8:30.I then walk downstairs and eat my breakfast of cereal in the lounge,watching Breakfast T.V. on my remote control T.V. Sometimes I watch a film on the video recorder.My mum and dad usually come home from the supermarket at about 11:00 by which time I am dressed.I then play records on my record player and play games on my computer.We then have a salad at 1:00p.m before my dad takes me into Harrogate in our car and I go round town shopping.I then get the bus home (It is 25p for the journey from Harrogate to Spacey Houses) and play games on my computer.We have toast and cheese and salad sandwiches for tea followed by chocolate biscuits.We then watch T.V.and videos until 10:30,when I read in bed and go to sleep.
